Reviews.Title: nokia n9 64gb
Reviews.Author: D. BREVAN "bishop362"
Reviews.Content: well i really enjoy this phone but the only problem i have was the price cause the phone does alot of stuff but its just like the nokia n8 or nokia n900 which i have those two phones an the only thing different is the swipe an the nfc an a couple of other features an the fact that there not going to have meego anymore an nokia went to windows i think that they shouldnt have sold the phone for that much but for all in all the phone is excellent.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
3.9" AMOLED capacitive touchscreen display; Corning Gorilla Glass; Multi-touch input method
16 GB Internal memory; Wi-Fi 802.11; Bluetooth v2.1; GPS with A-GPS support and Ovi Maps; NFC support
8 MP Camera with Carl Zeiss optics, autofocus, dual LED flash, Geo-tagging, face detection and touch-focus
MeeGo OS v1.2 Harmattan; DolbyTM Mobile sound enhancement; DolbyTM Headphone support
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia N9 16 GB Unlocked GSM Phone with MeeGo OS, 8MP Camera, NFC, Wi-Fi and GPS - Black
